page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: In the {Biggar }area there is one { {Primary School,}a {Secondary School } and a {List D School}. There used to be a {Primary School } in the neighbouring parish of {Skirling,}but this was closed by the Education Department of the Borders Region. Biggar Primary School is close to the{ {Secondary School} and indeed it was in part of what is now the Secondary. Now the Primary is housed in the Victorian building,which was at one time the old Biggar High School.The {Secondary {School }draws from a very large area of the Upper Ward streching from Crawford in the South to Carnwath in the North. It has probably the largest catchment area in Lanarkshire. The { {List D School} at Loaningdale provides a important service for socially deprived children with learning difficulties.
